reviewText: Der Tanzcoach - Tango, Rumba & Cha Cha Cha.....it's the worst product that I have ever been taken for.  It was blank.  The only saving quality was that it was so cheap.  It cost more to mail back then the cost if the purchase......so I'll keep it.  It is very embarrassing to be taken.
This will not play properly on dvd player, no titles and menus are visible, not worth returning, although it could be good, too bad.
